title: Service Learning-Based Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design Practicum Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Competency-building program integrating service learning to address real-world mathematical instructional design challenges experienced by elementary school teachers in public education settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the needs of actual elementary math education settings and accurately write an ADDIE model-based instructional design plan with over 80% precision.
Learners can execute and improve a community-developed math education program four or more times in collaboration with the local community.
Learners can design three or more customized math activity materials tailored to learner characteristics and apply them to digital platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
